name: XtremeGuard
overview:
XtremeGuard produces Screen Protectors and protective skins for mobile devices and tablets.

XtremeGuard has established a high quality name brand at a very competitive price in their market. Consumers still want to add that extra safety measure of a screen protector or invisible skin without compromising on clarity.

The protectors and skins use high quality films that create a ultra tough protective layer over the exposed screen of your device while maintaining high transparency so the user experience is not affected.
